website_summaries.verdict: A budget Troy-Bilt lawn mower that offers great performance for an affordable price.
pros: Controlled with a single variable-speed lever that makes throttle control easy
Large 21-inch cutting blade cuts through thick grass and troublesome spots in the yard with ease
cons: Lawn mower can be difficult to start, requiring several pulls of the starter cord

customer_reviews.title: I replaced a single speed low end Craftsman with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a single speed low end Craftsman with this one. In looking at the Sears site, I saw that one of the self propelled mowers was very highly rated. I checked into it and found that it was a re-branded Troy-Bilt. I also found that it was $40 less for the same mower with the Troy-Bilt branding. The self propelling triggers are very responsive and you DO have to pay attention as this mower will get up and go.
customer_reviews.author: S Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Height adjustment bolt fell off and broke spring on front axle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mower the first time in mid-May and had to get a replacement due to the folded handle being bent such that it could not be straightened (damaged in shipping it appeared based on the box damage). I've had the replacement for about 6 weeks and on the third mowing of our grass the bolt connecting the height adjustment lever to the front wheel axle came off while I was mowing and caused the spring on the axle to disconnect, thus rendering the mower unusable for a second time in two months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Jim

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mower. I put it together in no time ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mower. I put it together in no time and was soon zipping around my yard. The grass was very long since my mower died last spring but even on speed 2 of 4 it flew right over it! I would definitely purchase again. I am hoping that it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: I made a great choice!
customer_reviews.text: My grass was almost 2 feet high due to other mower broken. Put the oil in. Fired up in one pull. I mowed the lawn using just one arm. Very user friendly. Has plenty of power. I made a great choice!! So Happy
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The time I spend mowing the lawn has almost been cut in half.
customer_reviews.text: This Troy-Bilt lawn mowers performance exceeds that of my previous 11 year old Troy-Bilt in every way possible. If you'er use to a single speed self propelled walk behind mower you're in for a treat. You will love the variable speed drive. Set it on 2 for your detail work and then pop it to max speed for doing those long stretches (But please consult with your Physician first). Note: the time I spend mowing the lawn has almost been cut in half. Of course Troy-Bilt constantly revamps their product line. So who's to say how long the product will be supported with compatible replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: What a great lawn mower!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut two acres with after my John Deere rider broke..way to expensive to fix!..it cut thru tall grass , burr plants, weeds and kept on cutting. The only negative comment is because I don't weigh a lot that when I put the self propelled on , even at the low speed, it takes me off my feet... I am so pleased with this purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Chick

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 10 times or less being used
customer_reviews.text: First, self propel feature stopped working in 1 and 2 settings after 4-5 usages. Now, will not even run. Contacted Amazon and seller and also Troy Bilt. No responses of use. Meanwhile, my 6 year old Sears Craftsman that I gave to my daughter still runs great. Poor purchase decision by me, but at age 68, had been attracted to self propel feature.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mower. Easy start
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mower. Easy start. I do wish it had another level of power in the self propel to help me push, when I first used it I thought it would drag me when I put it on the highest level, but I got used to it and maybe a little dependent on the self propel part, but it is really good. I've gone over heavy roots and even big rocks (accidentally) and the blades are still intact. This thing will suck up pine cones, sticks and heavy leaves and mulch like a pro. We got a ride on mower but I decided to keep this because of its dependability and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Hanno94

customer_reviews.title: Make mowing fun again!
customer_reviews.text: It was so simple putting it together. It makes mowing so less stressful. It glides over the yard and make the right corners pretty and neat. I bought one for each of my sons as well. Only suggestion is to put a cup holder on it! That's how smooth it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Quiett

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This mower lasted less then a full season bought early this summer and would not start in August. Took it in for repairs told needed a new engine. You can verify by calling TruValue repair at 920=722 1588 ask about ALBA lawnmower.
customer_reviews.author: WISDOC

customer_reviews.title: Great mower!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once, but what a great mower! Fired right up out of the box and got the job done well. My lawn is fairly undulating, so the self-propelled feature was a must. Great variable speed control so you can cut at exactly the pace you're after. I thought the deck washing feature was pretty gimmicky, but I works surprisingly well if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Rear Powered for slopes
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review late after using the mower for more than a year. I have to say that I'm proud to have chosen this mower. In reality, it doesn't really start up on one pull when it's cold. But usually gets better when it's already hot. My small piece of lawn has these steep slopes. It really helps to have those rear wheels spinning to help push the mower up. My neighbors have already given up and started hiring landscapers or started buying battery operated ones because their lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Edzel

customer_reviews.title: Easy crank, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone else to mow my lawn. Had to do it myself before a party and found it was a really easy crank, ran smoothly. A lot different than the old days when you had to yank and pull and get frustrated. There's not even a choke on this, it just cranks right up.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best Lawn Mower I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Set up was super easy, started right up and the self propelled mechanism is the smoothest and quickest of any lawn mower I've ever used. Our old Kenmore got stolen... and I'm glad! Only possible way this could be better if it had reverse self propulsion or just be a riding mower. And it's pretty cheap too! Highly recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Berry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't self-propel after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March 2018 and it worked great. I just cranked it up this weekend to cut some weeds down and I got about a quarter of the way done and the self-propelled feature stopped. I made sure there's wasn't anything gumming it up and it looked fine but still a no-go. I guess I have a push mower for my 1 acre lot now.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a really nice unit
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a really nice unit. The height adjustment had an issue with the shoulder bolt being missing. Amazon knocked 10 percent off and I thought cool, I got ahold of MTD and ordered one. Turns out the hole is stripped out. This is low priority so I did a temp fix with a zip tie. Haven't even tried it yet but if I can get around to fitting it with a bolt and a couple nuts it should be good. I guess I shouldn't have to work on a new 300 dollar purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cork

customer_reviews.title: Nice mower, but ??????
customer_reviews.text: Nice mower, but bag does not stay on very well, The plastic thing for grass to come out of side does not stay on at all. The manual/instruction book is just a mess. You people think that it is okay to put the manual for every flipping mower into one book. How wrong you are. One has to read too many things to figure out their mower. With all of the good word processing and publishing programs, you need a book only for the mower you buy...not every damn Troy Bilt mower that you manufacture. Get yourself a digital camera, get your self a good artist and change up your booklets.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Old BEN

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely Happy with my New Troy Bilt Lawn Mower
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely Happy with my New Troy Bilt Lawn Mower.If ever a mower was built like an Army Tank this it it .I especially like the bagging attachment,I use the lawn clippings for various reasons around my garden like making a Tea from them and using it for free fertilizer.Also, you can cut your lawn using just one hand because the mower is self-propelled,saving your legs and back for other chores.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Rice

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this mower!!!
customer_reviews.text: I literally wept tears of joy when I first started it up and followed it around the yard. It does all the work for me! Last year I tore a muscle while pushing a lawnmower up a hill. This mower makes it possible for me to get some yard work done without hurting myself. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.C. White

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: In less than a year of minimum once a week usage this product experience catastrophic internal failure without any obvious reasons
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did my first cut today and there is nothing I don’t like about this mower
customer_reviews.text: I’ll just say wow! Did my first cut today and there is nothing I don’t like about this mower. My last mower was more of a push assist than a self propelled - this thing only requires you to hold on ! It’s also much liter and easier to manually push in tight spaces. I was looking at a much more expensive AWD version because my last mower did not self perpell well but I’m glad I took a chance on this one. Oh, ya it cuts well too!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Klima

customer_reviews.title: Good for single house lawn care
customer_reviews.text: This self-propelled Troy-Bilt lawnmower works ok. The only safety concerns I have is about the gas cap that easily opens and comes off due to the engine vibrations.
customer_reviews.author: Basile

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, runs well even on steep inclines. Amazons packing left a lot to be desired though. a couple pieces were slightly bent courtesy of usps. I realize there's only so much one can do before its the carriers fault rather than the shipper but there was no filling or care in the packing. thrown in a paper thin box that was torn easily. tl;dr As long as it makes it there in one piece you'll be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great reliable gas mower
customer_reviews.text: great reliable gas mower. have been using it for more than a year and works like a charm. It has all the features required for easy mowing like self-propelled that does not require pushing, rear wheel to help in uphill slopes and hose-hookup for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kishore R.

customer_reviews.title: So far a pretty good mower for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far a pretty good mower for the price. Starts easily, mows well. The bag unit does not stay on well if the grass get caught stuck in the grooves where the bag goes, which easily happens, but other than that so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: mkreberger

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent purchase. It was easy to put together and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase. It was easy to put together and has done a fabulous job of cutting our half acre. Love that it's self propelled too. I fantastic buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pomier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great on steep hill, what a relief... level 1 or 2 tremendous pull. 3 -4 Id be running behind!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rear wheel drive
customer_reviews.text: Love the rear wheel drive vs front wheel drive we had before ordering this mower. It’s so much easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 32 year old granddaughter. Difficult for her to put together. I still don’t think it works yet after several weeks. Not the lawnmowers fault. Need an expert to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: First time i bought, engine problem, so i ...
customer_reviews.text: First time i bought, engine problem, so i did exchange. Today i received new one and cut lawn. Some parts is broken.. very disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Kim, Woo-Tae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mower onhjgh speed I almost run yo keep up . No need to push this mower
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why mow, when you can just walk!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sixty year old woman. I would not have been able to cut the lawn in the photo without this great machine. Also, affordable. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Top dog
customer_reviews.text: Cuts like a brush hog, it handles thick tall grasses with ease and the propulsion works like it should
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: 2nd year, holding up great. Easy to start, moves easily up our big hill. Cuts nice. Clogs a bit when bagging.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything great but the grass catcher likes to fall off. Needs a lock in place function
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Mower
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this lawn mower. My brother has polio militias and is ablt to start this quickly and maneuver around yard comfortably with it. I too was able to start it with 1 pull. Highly recommend this mower! Very very happy with it!😀
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Karsko

customer_reviews.title: Great mower.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it, it came in 3 days to my cottage in northern Michigan. It was easy to set up in 5 minutes. Mows amazing and the self propelled feature works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: John A Fleckenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of mulching. Easy starter. First self propelled mower i ever had. Spoiled me how easy it makes grass cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blaszczak

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice to feel this thing propel itself and it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice to feel this thing propel itself and it makes mowing the yard a lot easier. With that said, those wheels failed to push it forward quite often and just didn't quite have the push needed quite a bit of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mower! I've cut my lawn about 8 times since I've owned it. It's outstanding at mulching and bagging. Unlike other mowers I've owned the bag actually gets completely full before you need to empty it. It's adjustable speed is great too. I walk pretty fast when I cut which on this mower is setting 3 out of 4.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Mower wouldn't stay on after 45 days.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mower for just over a month and has already stopped running. Stopped running in middle of mowing and tried to start again. Will start and run for about 5 seconds then turns itself off again. Keeps happening.. Tried to call and get a replacement, too late for that but can return it and receive $80.00 less than paid for. Also, called support to repair and it would take 3-4 weeks to repair minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Muehr

customer_reviews.title: Great mower.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it twice and just love it. It replaced a Lawn Boy that lasted 9 years. Hope this one does the same
customer_reviews.author: bnjdavid

customer_reviews.title: The cut is great, no blades of grass remain after a single ...
customer_reviews.text: The cut is great, no blades of grass remain after a single pass. Start up with in one or two pulls, good power and runs fast on 4.
customer_reviews.author: aps

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my brother who is ill. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother who is ill. He loves it, he said it practically mowes the lawn for him!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Started first pull out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Mowed our lawn for the first time today (~7500 Sqft). The mower performed very well. The instructions were easy to follow and the mower was incredibly easy to assemble. It has lots of features, all of which seem quite durable for the price point!
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Works well on steep incline
customer_reviews.text: Love this self propelled mower. It's got tons of power to get up steep inclines, yet, it's so light. ! I used it for an entire season and it's held up very well. I also love the price
customer_reviews.author: agreenerkim

customer_reviews.title: Cutting my grass again !
customer_reviews.text: This mower is the best. I wish i would have boughten it 3 years ago instead of fixing my OLD one.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Value!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing power, cutting, manageability. Minor assembly to handle only. No tools needed. Feels lightweight while mowing. Wonderful for slopes!
customer_reviews.author: Dijana

customer_reviews.title: Easy from box to yard. But if you have trouble with assembly, it comes with an 800 number to call.
customer_reviews.text: What I expected. All the bells and whistles. I had a John Deere and it was a very heavy, complicated to adjust mower. This mower is very user friendly, easy to adjust features and lighter to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mower ever!
customer_reviews.text: Light, one pull starts, and a well designed machine. Never been more happier about an equipment purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Dixon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke down and going threw a lot of red tape to get fix
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Moses

customer_reviews.title: First pull start!
customer_reviews.text: Pulled this out of the box, added oil and gas. Started on the first pull! Wow.
customer_reviews.author: bob layman

customer_reviews.title: Started on first pull!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but I added oil and gas and it fired up on the first pull.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on Hills!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than my other rear wheel drive mower! Turns easily and has a lot of power, even on the steep hills in my yard. I'm so glad i bought it! Was beginning to think I was going to have to give up mowing at 67 years of age. Should be OK for years to come now with my new mower!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Starts on first pull
customer_reviews.text: Starts on first pull, cuts clean, easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suvid

customer_reviews.title: Awesime
customer_reviews.text: Easy operation can work it with one finger easy clean just hook up your host love it
customer_reviews.author: grace smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time mower. Daddy always girls can’t mow cause they will cut their toes off. I’m happy to say at 44 years old, I mowed my first lawn and still have all 10 toes 😆. Easy to start and cut down grass that was tall enough to hide a village of critters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Moves easily with speed control self propel system. No connecting battery to charge. Easy start up. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: B.A. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. Mowed my yard in much less time. Even trim and no clumping!
customer_reviews.author: Scoobyfan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far runs well and is quite fast. A lot of plastic parts, hopefully they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use mower
customer_reviews.text: This mower is just what my husband wanted to address our weed issue. We have cheat grass and mustard weeds and it's doing the job. The adjustable height feature is good in avoiding rocks. It's easy to handle. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mann

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Him or Her!
customer_reviews.text: Having mowed a lot of lawns, this is an amazing mower. Easy to set up and easy to use. So easy my wife @ 5’2” uses it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sorensen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good performer.  Beware the yellow tag
customer_reviews.text: Light mower with plenty of pep. I use the first speed setting and find that plenty fast. I don't use the bagger. Note: upon assembly, I found a yellow tag I didn't understand. Turned out I needed to pull the handle up and out from under the deck, because part of the handle is underneath and will block the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made machine
customer_reviews.text: Start easy and pulls well. The package was damaged. The oil and blow guard was missing.
customer_reviews.author: William Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Self propelled
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this mower. The self-propelled feature works well.
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: It starts on the first pull and is easy to control with the hand controls
customer_reviews.text: After four uses I can say this mower is everything promised. It starts on the first pull and is easy to control with the hand controls.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great mower starts first time every time
customer_reviews.text: Great mower starts first time every time , good drive unit you can adjust the speed you like. Only drawback is discharge chute keeps coming off but that's minor
customer_reviews.author: Frank Walter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this lawnmower!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible lawn mower! I've used it 6 times and it's already falling apart! What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start and easy to move especially with the rear wheel drive. Easy to operate for a first time mower of the lawn like myself
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Good mower.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is the bagger is just not designed very well. Falls off very easy.
customer_reviews.author: James D Crawford

customer_reviews.title: That mower is powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: That mower is powerful and easy to use. As a woman I am able to cut my lawn which is somewhat uneven and hilly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: goes very fast on first gear, on second it fly haven't tried third it would make me fly.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Portal

customer_reviews.title: Engine blew after three uses
customer_reviews.text: Awful. After using the mower three times, the engine lost compression and won’t start. Had to be taken back to a dealer. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moves very smoothly, even on an upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: This mower is absolutely fantastic. We mowed our lawn after unpacking and assembling the mower.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mower and great value
customer_reviews.text: Bag has fallen off a couple of times, but it mulches so I don't even use the bag anymore. Excellent mower and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Mows like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: My grass in the yard is tall and thick. But this lawn mower cuts it fast and easily. Even when it is damp.
customer_reviews.author: robin storle

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability.
customer_reviews.text: Still starts at the first crank. I love the self-propel option.
customer_reviews.author: John Muhire

customer_reviews.title: good pulling power over a hilly yard with tree roots ...
customer_reviews.text: Starts every time with ease, good pulling power over a hilly yard with tree roots above ground.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne J. Greathead

customer_reviews.title: does exactly has product says fires up first pull. ...
customer_reviews.text: does exactly has product says fires up first pull. I have a 1/2 acre lot only dumped the bag 3 times. was impressed by how much it held. The gear ratio is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Craig rendleman

customer_reviews.title: I lOve Yhis Mower
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars For My Troy-Bilt Mover, I lOve Yhis Mower, Will Buy Again If Necessary👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: DESSIE

customer_reviews.title: Self propelled
customer_reviews.text: It was much easier for my grandson to mow our small hill
customer_reviews.author: Constance Jones

customer_reviews.title: Its a run behind mower
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a grass cutting monster. Simple to set up.. Starts first time every time. Cut my mowing time by half. It ABSOLUTELY more down everything. Very fast....
customer_reviews.author: K. Oshea

customer_reviews.title: Cannot start it.
customer_reviews.text: Mower will not start, pull cord sticks. When looking under the mower, you can see two black pipes that would prevent the blades from turning anyway, Very strange.
customer_reviews.author: A. Graysmith

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best lawn mower made
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best lawn mower made. Assembled, added gas and oil and it started on the first pull...amazing. Cuts like a dream and is adjustable to whatever pace you want to set. The grass catcher is almost perfect, even when the grass is slightly wet. If I had a lawn mowing service I'd buy a dozen of them!
customer_reviews.author: rambuild1

customer_reviews.title: I have used and the machine is great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together except for the bagging attachment. However the machine itself is excellent and I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: ceo55

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...it cuts the grass
customer_reviews.text: The bag doesn't stay on, we've only had it for a few months and it vibrates off...For a cheaper brand I would have expected this, but I thought I did enough research on this and I was wrong apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Amber wilt

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer defect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only cut part of my lawn when it sputtered and died. I took it to a mechanic and was told it was a manufacture defect. There was no compression and it needs to be taken apart for repairs. $55/hr to have a brand new lawn mower repaired. I got a Troy Built because I thought they were a good company. Update the machine was delivered March 6th, now its May 15th, still not fixed. The company is giving my repairman a run around. Its also cost me over $200 to have my lawn mowed while I wait for it to be repaired!
customer_reviews.author: Mona L Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great and the deck cleaning option is awesome
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Much easier than going to a store and trying to load a mower in your car. Arrived right at the door. Runs great. Love the way it starts--one pull.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this lawnmower. He says it is self propelled and very easy to use. He likes Troy-Bilt lawn equipment.
customer_reviews.author: JJRenee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and glad I splurged on a new mover!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Received the lawn mower when promised and once I put oil and gas in it it started on the first gentle attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go Troybuilt!
customer_reviews.text: Best mowing experience I've ever had. This mower is powerful and fast. Start out with the speed set at 1 (low). I found that the speed dial set at 2 worked well for me. I couldn't keep up with the machine at 3 or 4. Great, innovative, design. The mower had no problem cutting long, wet, grass and filling the basket without dropping it everywhere. The hose adapter for easy undercarriage cleaning works great. It is easy to set up, start, and use. I'm very happy with this mower at a price point that is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: I love this lawn mower, being the old woman that I am, it is really easy to maneuver and hardly uses any gas, and nice even cut. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia H.

customer_reviews.title: After 6 weeks the cord has pulled out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 weeks the cord has pulled out of the recoil assembly. Is there nothing built anymore that is made to last?
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.text: Delivered to my house. It will not start at all.

customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic mower easy to handle and easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. "One Pull" does not always start it!
customer_reviews.author: Dieter H. Klauss

customer_reviews.title: I put it together and right away I loved it! its simple to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I received this lawnmower today, I put it together and right away I loved it! its simple to assemble and looks great .Also I love the Speed Options Comfortable to walk with, I mowed the whole Yard about 1/2 acre took 20 min. Loved it. then I cleaned it using the Hose Connector, again Great, so Now I go to Put it away and the Handle is too long. and it won't Collapse either, I have to Completely Remove the Bolts to fold it or take out the "T" Bolts to remove the Entire Handle from the Mower to store it, this is a Big Issue for Me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lawn mower. Powerful and light weight for loading and unloading
customer_reviews.author: Will H.

product_meta.title: Troy-Bilt TB330 163cc 21-inch 3-in-1 Rear Wheel Drive Self-Propelled Lawnmower
product_meta.description: Troy-Bilt can help you comfortably accomplish your lawn mowing jobs this season. The TB330 self-propelled RWD lawn mower is powered by an easy-starting 163cc OHV 725ex Briggs & Stratton engine with ReadyStart technology for added ease. The single lever variable speed drive control is equipped with four top speed settings for individualized comfort and control. This rear wheel drive mower is equipped with a 21-inch TriAction complete cutting system: a rake bumper to lift grass upright, a specially designed blade for a finer mulch, and a symmetrical deck for superior grass flow, eliminating clumping or patches in your lawn. The TB330 is equipped with integrated deck wash and the ReadyStart system is a mechanism that automatically senses engine temperature and adjusts the air/fuel mixture to suit conditions perfectly. No hassles, no guesswork, no worries: To start, just pull the cord once for power - the ReadyStart starting system will do the rest. The 1.09-quart fuel tank and 1.9 standard bushel capacity grass bag mean it's unlikely you'll have to waste time filling up or emptying the TB330 mid-mow. The TB330 features 8-inch front and 8-inch rear wheels for easy maneuverability in uneven terrain. The single-lever deck height adjustment allows for six different grass height settings, from 1.25-inches to 3.75-inches, meeting all your length requirements. Troy-Bilt's TB330 is backed by a 3-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Powered by a 163cc Briggs & Stratton Engine
Equipped with a 21-Inch TriAction cutting system with integrated premium deck wash
Designed with a single-lever variable speed drive control with four top speed settings for individualized comfort and control
Comes with a 3-in-1 side discharge capabilities, mulch or rear bag - with a 1.9 bushel capacity bag included
Designed with 8 x 8-inch high performance wheels and an adjustable ergomatic handle for added ease while operating
